text: You see, we are His ‘poem’,The English word ‘poem’ comes from the Greek word here, ποιημα, and is one of its meanings. Just as each poem is an individual creation of the poet, so we are individual creations, not produced by a production line in a factory. created in Christ Jesus for good works,We are not saved by good works, but for good works. We do good works because we are saved, and if you don't… which God prepared in advance in order that we should walk in them.“Prepared in advance”—I imagine that this refers to God's moral code, the rules of conduct that everyone should follow (if everyone did we would not need jails, rescue missions, etc.).
